runs.comm: tossed up on the off this time, he doesn't turn the ball much, pushed back to the bowler
Sri Lanka off the mark, full on middle, turns it into the leg side for a single
Dilshan gives him the charge immediately, converts that flighted ball into a full toss and drives it back
shortish on leg stump and he tries to pull it fine, gets a leg-bye on the leg side
cheekily done, Jayawardene's a master at that shot, waits for it to turn away, there's good bounce as well and he just guides it behind short third for a boundary
short and wide and he shaped up for the cut, decent bounce again but Jayawardene missed as it turned away

the off stump has gone cartwheeling towards the keeper, gloom on the face of Sri Lankan fans, what a ball, landed on the off, short of a good length and nipped away just a hint to beat his defense and take out off stump
watches it onto the bat, on middle and nips in, he gets on the back foot and defends it back to the bowler
edged and wide of slip, only one slip in place, in the channel outside off and Sanga flirts with it with an open face, gets it to where second slip would have been, beats third man
shortish on leg stump and that's been turned off his hips to fine leg for a single
pitched it up this time, just outside off, a bit of away movement again, defended solidly to cover
goodish length this time, in the channel again and Jayawardene moves forward to defend it to cover
tosses it up on leg stump, turned towards square leg for a single
appeal for a catch, Ramdin going up more vociferously than Samuels, turns in from outside off, takes the top flap off the pad and lobs up to Ramdin, replay didn't show any deflection off the bat

dropped, costly miss, takes it from off and middle and sweeps it high but doesn't get it where he wanted to go, Bravo was there at deep backward square leg and he responded late, didn't see that coming initially and reacted late, ended up trying to make up for it by running in too quick and overran the ball there, just through his fingers and that's a drop
knocked down into the leg side for a single
gets forward and guides that one towards short third
shortish outside off and chops it down towards point
bad ball, poor stuff, short and way too wide, Jayawardene latched onto it, cut that hard past the diving point for what the ball deserved
on a good length this time and Jayawardene moves forward to defend that to cover
shortish on the off, defended to point, Sanga calls for a single but has been rightly sent back
shortish, bends low and takes that from outside off again, through square leg into the deep for a couple of runs
quicker delivery on a good length outside off, gets across and defends it into the off side
full toss on middle and that's turned gently in front of deep midwicket for a well-run couple, the throw in from the deep is a weak one
floating it on middle and leg, knocks it into the leg side for a single
Jayawardene wanted to sweep that more square but that goes towards short fine, no single there
waits for it to turn in from outside off, cuts that just wide of point for a single
flat just outside off, rocks forward and taps that to cover
fired in quick on middle and that's flicked through square leg into the deep for a single
beaten by the one that didn't turn, went on straight as Jayawardene played for spin and tried to open the face slightly
cut hard but straight to West Indies' best fielder, Pollard at point, short and wide
the best fielder in the West Indies side misfields, pushed it towards point and Pollard slips up this time, lets it through his legs
angling in towards middle, Jayawardene makes a bit of room and jabs that wide of mid-on for a single
good, sharp bouncer, Sangakkara came down the track and tried to pull that, with his eyes off the ball, missed, an appeal from Ramdin
slower one bowled short outside off, punched towards mid-off for a single
easily done, short of a good length, gets on the back foot and drops it into the leg side for a single
shortish on the off, goes on straight, pushed off the back foot through square leg, Mahela was looking for the second but it wasn't there
tossed up on the off, drives it towards long-off for a single
pitched up outside off and that's driven towards deep cover for a single
went on straight from round the wicket, slightly short outside off and that's chopped to point
lovely shot, a bit more air on that and he drives it crisply through extra cover into the deep for a couple of runs
on the off stump, drags that towards long-on for a single
beaten, sharp turn, lands on middle and shoots away to beat Sanga's outside edge
beaten again, making the batsman think here, tossed up outside off and it turns away as he comes forward to drive that loosely, misses
Sanga's not too confident out there, tossed up again and he gets a thick outside edge past point, tried to drive it through cover but the turn played some tricks there
the carrom ball, shortish on the off and that's dropped into the off side for a quick single
lands on leg and Sanga does this easily, drops it into the vacant space into the leg side for a single
gets across does Mahela, that's flatter and holds its line, Mahela offers the straight bat and defends it watchfully to the bowler
leading edge, Sanga comes down the track, Gayle bowling from round the wicket holds it back, Sanga closes the face too early, gets a leading edge in front of point
improvisation, Sanga made room there and Gayle angled it further in towards leg, Sanga picked that up beautifully, lofting it over extra cover for a one bounce four to ease the pressure
slapped towards long-off for a single
tosses it up to Mahela this time, fullish and Mahela digs it out towards deep cover for a single
full toss and Sanga gets a chance to swing it towards leg, gets it towards long-on for a single
ooh, just seemed for a moment that Mahela was shaping up for a big one but restrained himself in the end as he saw it turn in, dabbed it into the leg side for a single
Mahela swings and misses, turns away as he tries to slog-sweep, misses
came down the track and handled it well after BAdree dropped it short, cut towards deep point for a single

Pollard takes a good low catch at deep midwicket, Sanga appeared to have handled it well, made room and Badree followed him, short and he pulled it well but found the fielder, Pollard kept his calm, bent low and took it well inches from the ground
flighted on the off and that's driven down to long-on for a single
went on straight, got across to turn it gently into the leg side and excellent running as Ramdin had to run across to gather that, Mahela called for the second and made it back, 50 up
nicely done but there is a short third in place, moved away to late-cut it towards him
good length and straight, Mathews stays in his crease and defends
Mathews begins to make room but then plays the ball back towards the bowler
once again he backs away towards the leg side but plays the ball to cover, no room to work with and the length is good

bowled him! The pressure's got to Mathews. After three dot balls, when he moved towards leg and tried to play through the off, Mathews went towards the off side, got down on one knee and tried to scoop over short fine leg. The line was on middle and leg from Sammy and once Mathews missed, he was a goner
nudged off the pads towards fine leg
good length from round the wicket angling into the left-hander, Jeevan pushes towards point and wants one, Mahela yells no
Mahela tries to play the reverse pull but can't get it past short fine leg, Mahela looks like he wants to catch up with the par score
dropped, but such a tough chance. Mahela slogged the ball towards wide long on, Russell sprints to his left, covers so much ground, and dives forward, he gets both hands to it but can't hold on

stupendous fielding, Bravo sprinted to his left from long off and leaped full length to slap the ball back into play before it bounced over the boundary, Mahela had lofted the ball inside out over extra cover
cut off the back foot through point
Mendis tries to cut but has no room, he bottom edges into the ground and past the keeper
short ball outside off, Mahela cuts towards deep point

caught at point, that is a body blow to Sri Lanka! Mahela played the reverse pull but the ball was on the shorter side and he top edged it straight to point. That D-L par score is going to climb now. It looked like the drizzle was playing on Mahela's mind
the quick offbreak, played off the back foot to cover

Perera drives to long off and Mendis has been run out after a misfield I think! Sri Lanka are crumbling here. The batsman decided to take on Bravo's arm after he failed to pick the ball up cleanly. Bravo recovered well though and fired the throw to Narine, who collected and broke the stumps. Mendis dived but in vain
forced into the leg side for a single
cut off the back foot through point
full length on leg and middle, nudged off the front foot through square leg

another run out! Ramdin has run out Perera! The ball hit the pad and rolled close on the leg side, Perera set off for a leg bye. Ramdin was quick to scamper to his right, collect the ball and nail the stumps at the bowler's end with a direct hit. Perera was well short. Samuels was standing in the middle of the pitch after following through and was actually asking Ramdin not to throw. The ball zipped past his feet and on to the stumps
Thirimanne decides not to play a shot as the ball spins across him
driven to long off for a single
driven down the ground for a single
big turn across the left-hander after pitching outside leg stump, the ball hits Thirimanne's pads and he gets into a tangle
comes down the pitch and drives through midwicket
Kulasekara drives in the air towards long off and there's another mix-up between the batsmen. Charles threw to the keeper's end else there would have been another run out
Thirimanne tries to cut but the length is a bit too full and the line from round the wicket a bit too close to him

caught at wide long on! Thirimanne tried to slog it for six but mis-timed the shot, Charles was in position and he took the catch easily. Look at Sammy celebrate, he's ecstatic. Gayle and his captain are busting out the Gangnam
driven to long off for a single, that won't cut it for Sri Lanka
pushed towards extra cover for a single
a low full toss played out towards deep midwicket, Pollard makes a small fumble but there's no extra run
backs away towards leg but the bowler follows him with a short ball, the batsman pulls and the ball reaches the fine leg fielder on the bounce
Malinga opens his face to a short ball angling into him and plays it towards third man
that's huge from Kulasekara! High and far over midwicket. He cleared his front foot and slogged hard, smashing a length ball from Rampaul
the Premadasa roars! Kula's smashed another short ball, this time flat over midwicket for a one-bounce four, pulled it superbly

he's blitzing it now! Short and wide outside off, Kulasekara waits for it and cuts hard, behind point and wide of third man. Listen to that noise, the crowd is doing its bit. What's more it's a no-ball as well

the free-hit has gone for four! Kulasekara thrashed at a length ball outside off - Rampaul's length has been rubbish this over - and edged it high towards third man. Samuels came running forward and dived to take the catch, instead of staying back and saving the boundary. The ball bounced past him
good length outside off, Kulasekara drives to long off to retain strike. Sri Lanka need 44 off 24 balls. 22 runs off that over
makes room and lofts Narine back over his head, long-off runs to his right and keeps it to two
Kulasekara backs away and clogs, he gets beaten by the off break and the ball goes off his thigh to Gayle at first slip
caught at deep cover! Kulasekara backs away and slaps a slightly shorter ball towards deep cover, where Badree comes running in from the boundary and holds on. That has to be that
Malinga nudges the ball off his pads to short fine leg, he wants one but Mendis says no
Malinga stands and slogs, gets beaten outside off
another ball hits the pad and goes towards short fine leg, the batsmen chance the leg bye and Mendis just gets home before Ramdin breaks the stumps. Rampaul was the man at short fine leg
fires the ball into the pads, Malinga tries to hit through square but misses
backs away towards leg and hits the ball to long off
moves towards the off side and flicks the ball towards deep midwicket
goes back and towards leg to whip the ball towards long on, SL reach 100

Bravo begins to dance after catching Mendis at deep midwicket. He tried to slog for six but didn't hit it anywhere near the boundary. And look at that celebration. It looks like several West Indian players are dusting off Samuels' clothes. Such joy
worked off the pads through square leg for a single
tossed up on middle, Malinga steps out of his crease and drives to the bowler
Malinga hits the ball down the ground but refuses to run
quicker ball, Malinga takes it on the low full toss and hits through the off side

that's it, West Indies are the World Twenty20 champions. Malinga slogs the ball high towards long-on, where Bravo settles under the catch and sprints towards his team-mates. There's gangnam all over the outfield, Ramdin is cartwheeling, sort of, West Indies are champions! There's going to be such a party in their hotel tonight
